document.publication: The Poems of Emily Dickinson, Variorum Edition, Franklin, 1998
document.full_text: <xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan"> </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#8cdcff">Summer </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#98ff24">laid </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">her </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#e07c84">simple </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#e07c84">Hat </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">On </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">it's </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#b0bcff">mighty </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#e07c84">Shelf </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#e07c84">Unobserved </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">a </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#b0bcff">Ribbon </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#98ff24">dropt </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#e07c84">Snatch </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">it </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">for </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">yourself! </xhtml:span></xhtml:p>
document.title: Summer laid her simple hat
